summary: Build a unified notification engine supporting email, SMS, push, and in-app channels with template management, delayed scheduling, and personalization. System must handle dynamic fields, multi-language variants, timezone-aware delays, and channel optimization based on user preferences. Features include A/B testing, real-time analytics dashboards, compliance tracking (CAN-SPAM, CASL, GDPR), and automated opt-out management. Critical requirements: 25% open rate, <1% failed delivery, 10% user activation increase. Must integrate with Twilio, SendGrid, FCM and handle edge cases like nighttime scheduling and duplicate prevention.
